--- select_singer_with_in_and_unnest_with_query_parameter.sql
SELECT
  *
FROM
  Singers
WHERE
  SingerId IN UNNEST(@singerIDs)

--- AST
&parser.QueryStatement{
  Hint: (*parser.Hint)(nil),
  Expr: &parser.Select{
    pos:      0,
    end:      64,
    Distinct: false,
    AsStruct: false,
    List:     parser.SelectExprList{
      &parser.SelectExpr{
        pos:  9,
        end:  10,
        Expr: nil,
        Star: true,
        As:   (*parser.Ident)(nil),
      },
    },
    From: parser.FromItemList{
      &parser.FromItem{
        end:  25,
        Expr: &parser.TableName{
          end:   25,
          Ident: &parser.Ident{
            pos:  18,
            end:  25,
            Name: "Singers",
          },
          Hint: (*parser.Hint)(nil),
          As:   (*parser.Ident)(nil),
        },
        Method: "",
        Num:    nil,
        Rows:   false,
      },
    },
    Where: &parser.InExpr{
      Not:  false,
      Left: &parser.Ident{
        pos:  34,
        end:  42,
        Name: "SingerId",
      },
      Right: &parser.InCondition{
        pos:    46,
        end:    64,
        Unnest: &parser.Param{
          pos:  53,
          Name: "singerIDs",
        },
        SubQuery: (*parser.SubQuery)(nil),
        Values:   parser.ExprList{},
      },
    },
    GroupBy: parser.ExprList{},
    Having:  nil,
    OrderBy: parser.OrderExprList{},
    Limit:   (*parser.Limit)(nil),
  },
}

--- SQL
SELECT * FROM Singers WHERE SingerId IN UNNEST(@singerIDs)
